QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_VolumetricStratumBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Quantity measures associated to volumetric stratum such as in a geotechnical model. Uncertainty is documented in _Pset_Uncertainty_.

QtoDef.Name: Area
QtoDef.Definition: Actual area of upper surface of shape.

QtoDef.Name: Mass
QtoDef.Definition: Mass represented, if lower surface of stratum known.

QtoDef.Name: PlanArea
QtoDef.Definition: Projected plan area of upper surface of model.

QtoDef.Name: Volume
QtoDef.Definition: Volume represented, if lower surface of stratum known.
